root.name: Commander: Conquest of the Americas
root.description: Overview Commander: Conquest of the Americas is naval strategy game, combining elements from the trading and RTS genres.Beginning in the 16th century, players take control of a nation as they do battle with against competing European powers and the Native Americans. Using valuable resources, players can military forces or negotiate treaties. System Requirements OS: Windows 7 / Vista / XPProcessor: 2.0 GHz Core Duo or equivalentMemory: 2 GB RAMHard Disk Space: 4 GBVideo Card: 256 MB of dedicated memory with support for pixel shader 3.0. NVIDIA 7800 or equivalentSound Card: DirectX9 compatibleController Support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers
